comments.content: That’s a nice sample. Aren’t the captions reversed though? The top looks compressed.
Question for ’typesterone1’: why are you asking if you have the screen shot or example gif from the actual site?
@ Concrete: That’s just the annual Type ID Quality Control.

@ concrete - Florian is right. I am from the Bureau of Type ID Quality Control.  
Just joking. I forgot where I made this screenshot a year ago.

\> _the annual Type ID Quality Control_

Damn, they’re early this year. Why didn’t they warn me? :^/

Good performance guys, well done. Till next year! :^P
